page.title: 19LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: There are the following outdoor facilities at the Broadmeadow sports ground. Cricket, rugby, football,athletics track and an "inadequate" BMX track. There are still some problems with the shifting ground as this was built on reclaimed land. It does provide very valuable facilities, however, as Teignmouth is a town built on steep land and there is no other flat land available for pitches that take up a lot of space. Older people can play bowls either on the Den or at Bitton Park and the Den has other games like "Crazy Golf". A new canoeing club has been started in the town. The biggest gap is the lack of a large, heated swimming pool for all the year round use.
